data.title: The Real Alternative
data.meta_description: CLEAN Jams is a 60 minute program that shines a spotlight on Rap, Hip-Hop, and Recovery.
data.text:
Old Mill Road Media and WEQX are thrilled to present CLEAN Jams, a new radio show hosted by Benjamin Lerner, every Thursday night at 11pm.

In addition to Sober Rap & Hip-Hop music, each episode includes a guest interview with a health professional, musician, politician, lawyer or other recovery partner, discussing addiction and sobriety.

Episode 32:

On tonight’s episode of CLEAN Jams, we’re playing some of the most influential and time-tested lyrically-conscious Hip-Hop tracks from the past forty years, including choice cuts from Eric B & Rakim, Outkast, Tupac, Nas and Kendrick Lamar. Recovery is all about honesty and authenticity, as is Hip-Hop music.
